item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, I’m Marcela Güiza, I’m an experienced Android developer. I have been working with Android native applications for more than five years, and now I can say those years have been wonderful and very challenging time for me. I had the opportunity to know about mobile development and to get involved in Android platform, and now I want to continue learning new things and having new challenges in this world.

item.title: Experience
item.description:
ANDROID DEVELOPER October 2018 – Currently Nisum I am working in the construction and development of Bci bank application using Java & Kotlin. Also, I am working with http services, RxJava, Material Design, Git, Java, XML, WebServices, Gradle, Unit testing, dependency injection, Clean Architecture, Android Architecture Components (Live Data and ViewModel) and Android libraries.
ANDROID DEVELOPER July 2017 – October 2018 Blanc Labs In Blanc Labs I was working in the construction and development of Android native applications using Kotlin most of the time.

item.title: Portofolio
item.description: Applications below are part of the portfolio in which I have worked: Bci Banking app to make transactions, payments and know about credits and account details. Nekso Passenger & Nekso Driver Nekso is a transportation ecosystem that connects passengers to a network of taxi companies. Tappsi Driver & Tappsi Passenger Tappsi is the Colombian app to connect a passenger with a driver, also allows to share the taxi license plates via email, social networks or SMS/iMessage.
